title: Rally The Valley: State Bicycle Co. Celebrates NBA Finals with Limited Run 6061 Black Label
content:
The last time the Phoenix Suns appeared in the NBA Finals, Charles Barkley was 29. After almost a 30-year wait, Arizona’s State Bicycle Co. wasn’t going to let a promotional opportunity go to waste. So the PHX-based builder gave a limited run of its 6061 Black Label Collection commuter bikes purple-and-sunset-gradient Suns colors. The “Valley” […]

The post Rally The Valley: State Bicycle Co. Celebrates NBA Finals with Limited Run 6061 Black Label appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
